survey_name: Digital Book Subscription Service Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of digital book subscription services to understand satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current digital book subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current digital book subscription service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in a digital book subscription service? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Access to a wide variety of genres
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand feature priorities.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in a digital book subscription service? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Access to a wide variety of genres

questions.question_text: How often do you use your digital book subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Frequency data helps assess engagement levels.

script.question_text: How often do you use your digital book subscription service?

questions.question_text: What type of books do you typically read on your digital subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed to capture diverse reading preferences.

script.question_text: What type of books do you typically read on your digital subscription service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current digital book subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current digital book subscription service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your digital book subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your digital book subscription service?

questions.question_text: How important is the inclusion of audiobooks in your subscription service?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to gauge audiobook importance.

script.question_text: How important is the inclusion of audiobooks in your subscription service?

questions.question_text: Which device do you primarily use to access your digital book subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Single choice to identify primary access device.

script.question_text: Which device do you primarily use to access your digital book subscription service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of your current digital book subscription service?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure pricing satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of your current digital book subscription service?

questions.question_text: How long have you been using your current digital book subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Single choice to assess customer tenure.

script.question_text: How long have you been using your current digital book subscription service?
